CustomField.description: LEM-2983: Captures the budget name funding the campaign related to the Brief.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Note that the business campaign name is equivalent to the budget name that will fund this campaign. It must match a business campaign name in the Promo Budget & Forecast sheet. Note that this is common for New Vertical campaigns, though may also apply to Rx campaigns, etc.
CustomField.label: DD Funded Budget Name (Given by Finance)
